recipes.cooking_instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water. Fry pancetta with garlic until crisp. Beat eggs with cheeses and pepper. Drain pasta, mix with pancetta. Stir in egg mixture off heat. Serve.
Cook fettuccine in salted water. Sauté garlic in oil, add chicken, season with salt and pepper, and cook through. Stir in cream and cheese. Toss with pasta.
Heat oil in a pan. Stir-fry beef until browned. Add garlic, onion, and bell pepper. Stir in soy and oyster sauce. Serve over rice.
Sauté onion in oil. Add chopped vegetables, curry powder, and salt. Pour in coconut milk and simmer until vegetables are tender. Serve with rice.
Cook beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef, chopped tomato, lettuce, cheese, and sour cream.
Preheat oven to 250°C. Roll out dough, spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella, and bake for 10 minutes. Top with fresh basil and olive oil.
Grill chicken with salt and pepper. Toss lettuce with dressing, croutons, and parmesan. Top with sliced chicken.
Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder. Beat in egg and milk. Heat butter in a pan, pour batter, cook until bubbles form, flip and cook through.
Fry onion with spices, add chicken and yogurt, and simmer. Cook rice separately. Layer chicken and rice, cover, and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Sauté onion and garlic, add beef and brown. Stir in tomatoes, chili powder, and beans. Simmer for 30 minutes, serve with rice.
Beat egg, milk, and cinnamon. Dip bread in mixture. Fry in butter until golden on both sides. Serve with maple syrup.
Cook beef with salt and pepper. Layer noodles, ricotta, beef, sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish. Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.
Sauté onion and garlic, add tomatoes and broth. Simmer for 20 minutes. Blend until smooth, season with salt and pepper.
Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between slices, butter side out. Grill in a pan until golden brown and cheese melts.
Cook beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef, tomato, lettuce, cheese, and sour cream.
Sauté garlic in butter, add shrimp, and cook until pink. Pour in white wine and lemon juice, cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with parsley.
Grill fish with lime juice. Fill taco shells with fish, cabbage slaw, cilantro, and sour cream.
Marinate chicken with lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper. Sauté in olive oil until cooked through. Serve with vegetables.
Sauté onion, garlic, and carrot. Add rice, soy sauce, and peas. Push rice to the side, scramble eggs, and mix everything together.
Season wings with salt and pepper. Bake at 200°C for 25 minutes. Toss with BBQ sauce and bake for another 10 minutes.
